statements: DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 1 AND login_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_sessions WHERE logout_timestamp < '2022-01-15' AND player_id = 2;
DELETE FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE player_id = 10 AND end_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_logins WHERE player_id = 123 AND login_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE player_id = 456) AND end_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE session_id = 100 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_id = 10 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM player_rewards WHERE player_id = 201 AND reward_id = 1;
